Back to Franz Schubert

Franz Schubert

Sonata in A-flat major, D 557

1817

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 14' 30"

  • 1. Allegro moderato
  • 2. Andante
  • 3. Allegro

It is not known whether the sonata is missing a final movement.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Schubert-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · VII/2/1 · BA 5553 · Klaviersonaten I · ed. Walburga Litschauer
  • Associated Board · Complete Pianoforte Sonatas / Volume I · ed. Howard Ferguson
  • Bärenreiter · BA 9642 · Klaviersonaten I / Die frühen Sonaten · ed. Walburga Litschauer
  • Henle · HN 150 · Klaviersonaten / Band III · ed. Paul Mies
  • Henle · HN 151 · Klaviersonaten / Band III · ed. Paul Mies
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50220 · Sämtliche Klaviersonaten / Band 1 · ed. Martino Tirimo

1. Allegro moderato

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 2.5

2. Andante

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

3. Allegro

Duration: 7'

Difficulty: 3
